review_title: Not sure why so many low ratings
one_reviews_text: This game works fine and it's free.  It's an escape puzzle game type with cinematic cut scenes.  Touch controllers work, but I suggest a roomscale setup so you can easily reach objects (this is not a point and click game unless you choose the gaze option!).  The cinematics are good.  My main complaint is that you move very slowly, painfully slow.  However, the puzzles are pretty logical.  The first room puzzle is basically given to you.  You just have to guess the lockpad combination.  If you pay attention to your surroundings, that should not be difficult at all.  The second room puzzle involves thinking a bit about how to get the radio working.  It should be pretty easy to figure out.  The only hard part is that it is timed so you do have to find necessary items quickly.  But you get to start right over and the end of time, so it's not a big deal if you "lose."  I would only give this 4 stars, but because of so many low star reviews, I decided to bump up to 5 to counterweight those idiots reviewing this low.

I recomment to NOT INSTALL this app since it seems to be poor coded. EVERYTIME you run the app it creates a new "Program Files" folder in your c:/ drive and who knows what else it does to your pc...
